hero.description: I help businesses build great web applications. As a Full Stack Developer, I work with PHP, Python, and JavaScript to create solutions that actually work for your needs, using Symfony, Laravel, Django, FastAPI, Flask, and React.

services.title: How I Can Help
services.description: I can work with you to help you build your web projects from scratch or come in as a consultant.

backend.title: Backend/APIs
backend.description: I build the engine that powers your apps. Whether you need a solid API for your mobile app or a robust backend system, I'll help you create something that's both powerful and maintainable.

webApps.title: Web Applications
webApps.description: Need a website that works beautifully and loads fast? I create modern web applications that your users will love to use, with special attention to making them accessible to everyone.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: Not sure about the technical side of things? With 6+ years of experience building web applications, I can help guide your project in the right direction. Think of me as your technical co-pilot.

scanifood.description: A smart solution that helps restaurants create digital menus with QR codes. No more printing paper menus - just scan and order!

kaherecode.description: A friendly space where developers can learn and share what they know. Because learning to code is better when we help each other.

blog.title: Blog & Tutorials
blog.description: I share practical tips and tutorials about PHP, Python, and JavaScript development. Here you'll find real solutions to common challenges, coding best practices, and lessons learned from building production applications. No fluff, just useful content to help you become a better developer.
blog.metaTitle: PHP, Python & JavaScript Development | Mamadou Aliou Diallo
blog.metaDescription: Practical tutorials and insights about PHP, Python, and JavaScript development. Learn Laravel, Symfony, Django, FastAPI, Flask, and React through real-world examples.
